title: Database Architecture
subject: Database Management Systems
theory:
How the system is laid out.
- **1-Tier**: DB and App on same machine (Desktop app).
- **2-Tier**: Client-Server (ODBC/JDBC). Direct DB connection from client.
- **3-Tier**: Client -> Server (Logic) -> DB. (Web Apps). Secure and scalable.

interview_questions.question: Why is 3-Tier preferred for Web?
interview_questions.answer: Security. Database is hidden behind the Application Server. Client cannot run SQL directly.
